member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_METADATA_STATISTICS
member.summary: Represents encoding statistics about an operation.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_METADATA_STATISTICS.AverageQP
member.summary: Output field that receives the average QP value used for encoding this frame.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_METADATA_STATISTICS.IntraCodingUnitsCount
member.summary: Output field that receives the number of intra-coded coding units used in this frame.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_METADATA_STATISTICS.InterCodingUnitsCount
member.summary: Output field that receives the number of inter-coded coding units used in this frame.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_METADATA_STATISTICS.SkipCodingUnitsCount
member.summary: Output field that receives the number of skip coding units used in this frame.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_METADATA_STATISTICS.AverageMotionEstimationXDirection
member.summary: Output field that receives the average motion vector shift in X direction.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_METADATA_STATISTICS.AverageMotionEstimationYDirection
member.summary: Output field that receives the average motion vector shift in Y direction.
